name: VideoGameReviewHUB (Canceled)
blurb: A Video Game Reviewers Paradise\u200b, Protected from loss of income due to Copyright Infringement Claims.. backed by Swedish Laws

rewards.reward: Just to show your support in a small way to you but a big way to me, what you will gain from this tier is your name on the backer's page of the website, in gray and a bit smaller, i will though see about setting it up so if you hover over the names they will enlarge.\r\n\r\n**Note, your name will be small and grayed out a bit so it will be a tad hard to see, that is why i will make them enlarge when you hover over a name**

Same as the last Tier, only thing is that your name will be 1.5 bigger in size, and a warm fuzzy feeling :)


**Note, your name will be small and grayed out a bit so it will be a tad hard to see, that is why i will make them enlarge when you hover over a name**
Same as the last Tier, only thing that is different is that your name will be displayed as double the size from the first tier and also will be solid black and now grayed out.
For a extra 5 USD$ you are able to pick the color your name will be on the backer's page
For a extra 5 USD$ you are able to change the color of your user name on your profile as well to one of six colors

At this Level of tier you are able to pick your own color via a RGB panel, plus you will get a T-Shirt sent to you after all cost of the custom web design is covered for and at least 6 months of the server is paid off, i put that Estimated delivery date because i don't really know when, all i know is it will.. if you know what i mean :) \r\n\r\nAs well as have your name on the backer's page will be 4x bigger and much easier to see... let others see your love that much easier !!
At this level of tier you will get every thing from the last one, but will be allowed to change the font of your user name on your profile to one of 10

For a extra 5 USD$ not only will you get every thing that came before, but on the community page we will have a poll every few months for members to pick one of 5 fonts that will be displayed.. only one winner, the other fonts will be saved for another time.\r\n\r\n**NOTE ONLY MEMBERS THAT GET THIS TIER  AND ABOVE WILL BE ABLE TO VOTE FOR NEW FONTS**

All that came before... and adding a option to customize your profile a bit with a background.\r\n\r\n**NOTE ALL BACKGROUNDS ARE BUILT IN, YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO PICK YOUR OWN, AND THE ONLY WAY TO GET THEM IS BY BEING ACTIVE MEMBER IN THE COMMUNITY CHATS**

This Tier is a nice one, getting every thing that came before... Plus a custom T-Shirt replacing the one you would get for the 50 USD$ Tier, but this one will have a personal message from me, my signature at the bottom, also a 2nd T-Shirt to give to a friend and will say some thing funny relating to what the backer's T-Shirt will say\r\n\r\n**Please note that i want to make this T-Shirt 100% one of a kind, so if you do get this tier i will leave some contact info some were on this page for you to show me proof, once you do we can talk so i can get to know you a bit, from what i find out about you, there will be a custom message on the T-Shirt and the 2nd one will say some thing funny about it.. if you don't make a attempt to reach out to me i will just add a generic message with my signature under it, so don't miss out on the full gift (Only First 25) so get them while they last :P**

Here not only will you be able to use your own background for your profile and be able to use effects on your user name on your profile, but you will be given 5 codes to give out to your friends in any way you want.. after all it is YOURS,  When some one enters it into their account it will give them this gift as well so spread your love to them ! **Please note that when giving this gift to some one and they use it, it will display on their profile for life that you gifted it to them, i think its a nice touch**\r\n\r\n((Limited to first 50))

For this Tier you will be able to have the same ability as a Up-loader, without the uploading part, what i mean by this is you will be able to 100% customize your profile, you will be given a extra option in your account settings that will let you export a empty shell of your profile, you can then open it up in a Editor, and be able to move and place things where you want them and upload your finished work to your account, we will review it and make it active for you in 24 to 48 hours. as well as get 5 more codes from the last tier for a total of 10 you may share with your friends\r\n\r\n((Limited to first 25)

All the wonderful goodies that came before plus Custom Badge that will be displayed next to your name when you post a comments, it will be a nice detailed badge, gold colored with a diamond in the middle to show off your *Blingy* love for us
as well as have your user name 1.5 bigger in size and bold, with a thin gold outline around it ((because you can't have a nice badge there and have a plain old boring name can you!))

**By having this gives you permanent VIP status that would otherwise have to be worked for and maintained to keep. 
((but while you can earn VIP status for your work in the community chat you will not get the golden badge like if you were to gain this tier.. in its place you will see a Heart or a Star depending on what you want and what you set in your profile settings))

((Limited to 15 Lucky First Comers))

With this Tier you will gain another ability that up-loaders have witch is to talk to me directly over the website and not have to leave a message with the support team ((why would you want this ? on top of being able to talk to the site owner from time to time you will be able to suggest site changes to me, and once every few months i will take the top 5 i like the most and at the same time as we are having the poll for the font we will have a vote for one of the site changes, please note that this poll will be up for 6 months from the day it is put up to give every one more then enough time to be able to vote and to give us time to set up the changes what ever they may be))\r\n\r\n((Oh ya i almost forgot... you also get the golden badge that the last tier would get making it a total of 20 members with it.... only the 5 that are gained from this tier will have two affects, glow or sparkle effects to stand out even more.. because you just love that bling and love showing it off even more.... ROFL !! ))

If all works out well i want to be able to talk to the up loaders if they have time in between filming and editing and plan a yearly meeting of me and any uploaders that wants to get together and work on a yearly project together that will be on my profile on and the main page for a while, don't know what the project will be it could just be some thing we put together for each anniversary that the website is up and running.\r\n\r\n((some small bit of info not related to this tier prize, is that later on in the websites life.. after it has grown strong with a nice daily steady amount of traffic we will be giving out one invite to join us to a member of the website that gained VIP status via the hard way, aka not a perm VIP status member.. at random))

At this tier, 10 lucky members are put on a list, and if a reviewer needs a extra for a video they are working on and just want to include a community member in their video in any way we will pay for their travel and place to stay at for at max a week, the lucky member is picked at random and contacted by me or the reviewer to see if they are available, if not the next person on the list will go next and next person to go will be the member that was not able to make it.. if they are ready this time...

((This is a great way to see first hand how hard it is to make the videos that we all enjoy first hand, also you can learn how to be a pro over time, if you are looking into becoming a reviewer this is not a bad idea, think of it like a short internship you are on, no reviewer will be the same they will all have their own style to bring to the table.. this may be where you can pick up your own
((this is limited to 10 because i want some one to be able to go, there is a small chance that 5 people may not be able to go.. there is also a chance not many people will join the ranks of this tier but it will be offered))
